ItemTooltips.boots: If you random razor and don't get boots - you're going to have a bad time.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Keep mana and hp up. use at 3+ if needed. SPAM THE STICK - if there is a Bristleback, PA, Batrider or any spam skill heros.... this stick be your bitch.
ItemTooltips.power_treads:
Use on strength or Agi. Depending on what your HP is and what you feel comfortable with.
AGI=More DPS+armor+attackSpeed
STR= More HP/Regen
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Completely optional. Cheap early alternative to vanguard.
ItemTooltips.wraith_band: Optional but always nice damage boost.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Because who needs the whole team to be there when taking on half their team?
ItemTooltips.sphere: Feel you need more HP and toughness?
ItemTooltips.vanguard: always a good choice if you seem to be needing HP and Regen earlier in the game. Great for chasing with ult
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Razor is an agility hero. That is all that needs to be said
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: great to get Yasha first for speed boost.
ItemTooltips.desolator: make the decision to get before or after scepter. always a hard decision.
ItemTooltips.yasha: The extra movement speed allows for amazing dives - it's your choice to go MEK or Scepter before this.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Upgrad your wraitband and get some mana regen if you want.

AbilityTooltips.razor_plasma_field: At lvl 4. start farming creep waves with this. One attack on the range creep then focus on last hitting other units.
AbilityTooltips.razor_static_link: scare the carry or the dps of their team. suck their dmg and make them run. It's up to you to put one into this skill early on.
AbilityTooltips.razor_unstable_current: Defense from casts & movement speed? Really it's up to the game play and scenario if you want to max this first. Having higher movement speed can make or break many situations.
AbilityTooltips.razor_eye_of_the_storm:
Don't be afraid to tower dive if you have two teammates coming the other way. just follow the enemy hero and smack 'em.
Use your ult when chasing 1v1, 2v1, 2v2, 2v3 or in team battles. Always worth to pop up when getting chased as well if you have the health to survive.
